dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 4357 IH: Permanent CFC Look-Through Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Tenney (for herself and Ms. Sewell) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make the look-through rule for related controlled foreign corporations permanent.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Permanent CFC Look-Through Act of 2023.

section.header: Look-through rule for related controlled foreign corporations made permanent

subsection.text: Section 954(c)(6) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking subparagraph (C).

The amendment made by this section shall apply to taxable years of foreign corporations beginning after December 31, 2023, and to taxable years of United States shareholders with or within which such taxable years of foreign corporations end.
